Package gobblin.data.management.policy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VersionSelectionPolicy<T extends DatasetVersion>
    Selection policy around versions of a dataset.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTimeBasedSelectionPolicy
    An implementation of VersionSelectionPolicy which returns versions that satisfy a Predicate implemented by subclasses AbstractTimeBasedSelectionPolicy.getSelectionPredicate() method
    CombineSelectionPolicy
    Implementation of VersionSelectionPolicy that allows combining different policies through a union or intersect operation.
    EmbeddedRetentionSelectionPolicy<T extends FileSystemDatasetVersion>
    A wrapper VersionSelectionPolicy that delegates calls to deprecated RetentionPolicy
    NewestKSelectionPolicy
    Select the newest k versions of the dataset.
    SelectAfterTimeBasedPolicy
    An implementation of AbstractTimeBasedSelectionPolicy which returns versions that are newer than a certain time.
    SelectAllPolicy
    Implementation of VersionSelectionPolicy that selects all FileSystemDatasetVersions.
    SelectBeforeTimeBasedPolicy
    An implementation of AbstractTimeBasedSelectionPolicy which returns versions that are older than a certain time.
    SelectNothingPolicy
    Implementation of VersionSelectionPolicy that selects nothing.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CombineSelectionPolicy.CombineOperation
